name: Tentacruel

ability.name: Toxic Behavior
ability.effect: As long as Tentacruel has any damage counters on it, whenever a Pokemon takes damage from Poison, you may remove 1 damage counter from Tentacruel.

attacks.name: Sludge Wave
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to all of your opponent's Benched Pokemon

flavor: Fans of this Pokemon say it is misunderstood. That said, it is an invasive species in a few corners of the world.
